channel.title: {562}Walking/running problem!{RS2HD}
channel.description:
Hey, i am using source Jagex-scape. Link to source -- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,435936.0.html
Okey, i did everything right, i logged in, even made me admin, than i started to walk, it walks 1 step, laggs, 1 step, lagg, 1 step, lagg.... etc. How do i fix it? Running same, run 2 steps, lagg, 2 steps, lagg. Makes me angry. Than the same with combat. How do i fix it please? or someone could fix this for me?? please help :(

item.title: {562}Walking/running problem!{RS2HD}
item.dc:creator: @arturspkscape arturspkscape
item.description:
@arturspkscape wrote:

[quote=“frostscapeserver, post:2, topic:342525”]If its in HD its gonna lagg. You need serious internet connection for it not to lagg especially if its a big server. 1gbps at least. Try a different source and see if it laggs.[/quote] thanx, but it laggs on all servers that i host.

Read full topic

If its in HD its gonna lagg. You need serious internet connection for it not to lagg especially if its a big server. 1gbps at least. Try a different source and see if it laggs.
